title: About me
subTitle: about
whoIAm: Who I am, my skills, what I do
intro: I'm a Front-End developer from Brazil, living in Mar del Plata, Argentina.
description: I care about site speed, user experience, cross browser compatibility, and of course, responsiveness (I always start projects in a mobile-first approach)
skillsList: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, NextJS, JSX, Jquery, Bootstrap, Sass, Tailwind, Styled Components, VSCode, Git Github, Figma, Trello, Slack.
